title: How to Create Arrows in Inkscape

media:group.media:title: How to Create Arrows in Inkscape
media:group.media:description:
In this Inkscape basics tutorial, I take an in-depth look at how to draw arrows using the pen tool and "markers" feature inside the Fill and Stroke dialogue. Arrows are a great way to add eye-catching graphics to your projects, while also serving a more functional role of drawing viewers' attention to a particular item or making a connection between objects. I cover all the customization settings for drawing arrows (including all the types of arrowheads or markers) in this tutorial.

Check out the Help Article version of this tutorial, available in 30+ languages: https://daviesmediadesign.com/how-to-create-arrows-in-inkscape/
